name: FNB Corporation
description: FNB Corporation is a diversified financial services company headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Established in 1974, FNB operates a network of banking offices and financial centers throughout Pennsylvania, Ohio, Maryland, and West Virginia. The company offers a wide range of financial products and services, including commercial banking, retail banking, and wealth management. FNB is committed to delivering personalized service and innovative solutions to meet the needs of its customers, from individual consumers to businesses of all sizes. The bank has a robust digital banking platform that enhances the customer experience and provides convenient access to banking services. FNB's mission is to be a trusted partner to its customers, providing them with financial expertise and support to help them achieve their financial goals. The company also actively participates in community development initiatives, supporting local organizations and programs that enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves. With a focus on growth and sustainability, FNB Corporation continues to expand its footprint and enhance its service offerings in the competitive financial services landscape.

seo.meta_title: FNB Corporation | Comprehensive Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore FNB Corporation, a leading financial services provider offering a range of banking solutions and wealth management services. Learn about FNB's commitment to customer service and community development.

faq.question: What services does FNB Corporation offer?
faq.answer: FNB Corporation offers banking services including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is FNB headquartered?
faq.answer: FNB Corporation is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of FNB Corporation?
faq.answer: Vincent J. Delie Jr. is the CEO of FNB Corporation.
